text:
Religion

Shri Bhandarakeri Mutt: Discourse on “Sri Vyasarajara songs”, Sri Raghavendra Swami Temple, 6 p.m.

General

Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan: Golden Jubilee celebrations, R. Seshasayee, chairman, Infosys, chief guest, Sanjay Jayavathanavelu, CMD, Lakshmi Machine Works, guest of honour, Bhavan’s premises, 5.30 p.m.

SNS College of Engineering: Project contest and workshop, 8.30 a.m.

Saraswathi Ramachandran Vidyalaya Matric. Hr. Sec. School: Award Ceremony and Silver Jubilee celebrations, 5 p.m.

Bombay Chartered Accountants Society: Workshop on “Internal financial controls IND AS and Refresher on Companies Act 2013”, The Residency Towers, 9 a.m.

KPR Institute of Engineering and Technology: State-level Science Fest 2016, 10 a.m.

Poompuhar: Crafts mela, Meenakshi hall, 10 a.m.

Avinashilingam University: Conference on “Transition of financial sector for sustainable development”, 10 a.m.

VIVRO Finance Services and JMACS Associates: Programme on capital mobilisation for SMEs, The Grand Regent, 10 a.m.

Shree Sarasswathi Vidhyaah Mandheer: Annual Day celebration, 4.30 p.m.

UMS Technologies Ltd: Product launch event of “UMS GT Lab”, Gopal Bagh, 2 p.m.

T.V. Sekharan Memorial Matriculation Hr. Sec. School: Annual Day, 4.30 p.m.

Murugappa Group: Murugappa Kovai Quotient Quiz 2016, PSG Auditorium, 2 p.m.

Sri Sowdeswarri Vidyalaya Model Matric. Hr. Sec. School: Annual Day celebrations, 5.30 p.m.

Karpagam College of Engineering: Inauguration of IEEE and Workshop on “Latex for Research Publications”, Lab VIEW Academy, 9 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology: Guest lecture on capital market awareness,

10 a.m.

Dhaanish Ahmed Institute of Technology: Annual Day and Sports Day function, 9 a.m.

Shri Nehru Vidyalaya Matric. Hr. Sec. School: KG Graduation Day,

5 p.m.

Tamizhaga Vivasayigal Sangam: Meeting, Tamizhaga Vivasiygal Sangam, Vayyampalayam, 10 a.m.

Nehru Institute of Technology: National Level Technical Symposium for school students, Seminar Hall,

10 a.m.

PPG Institute of Technology: Workshop on “Wordpress”, Seminar Hall, 9.30 a.m.

V.L.B. Janakiammal College of Arts and Science: Faculty Development Program 10 a.m.; Teenz Karnival 2k16, 10 a.m.

Nehru Institute of Technology: Aspire 2016, 10 a.m.

Agro Forestry News Letter: meeting, Office of the Conservator of Forests, 10 a.m.
title: Coimbatore today
